creditline: Lent by the Wang Xing Lou Collection
description: porcelain doucai chicken bowl; landscape setting with rooster, hen and chicks feeding
medium:
Doucai ware
Porcelain with underglaze blue and polychrome overglaze enamel decoration
text: The decoration here of a cock, hen, and chicks in a garden is a Confucian reference to the traditional patriarchal family system in China. The scene is exceptionally well executed in a palette of underglaze blue and enamel colors.
title: Bowl with Design of Chickens in a Garden
